root.title: MSSQL SPProcoption Set
root.description: Detects when the a stored procedure is set or cleared for automatic execution in MSSQL. A stored procedure that is set to automatic execution runs every time an instance of SQL Server is started
root.author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)

logsource.definition: MSSQL audit policy to monitor for 'sp_procoption' must be enabled in order to receive this event in the application log

falsepositives.item: Legitimate use of the feature by administrators (rare)
